EmailTemplate.name: Total Points Assessed_13-ODE
EmailTemplate.subject: Non-Compliance Point Accumulation Threshold for {!CLQ_Program__c.Name}, {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} Achieved.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!CLQ_Program__c.Name}, {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} has accumulated atleast thirteen (13) points from all inspections during their provisional license period. A review of the program and the infraction is required.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
